metadata.title: CVE-2024-0456 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An authorization vulnerability exists in GitLab versions 14.0 prior to16.6.6, 16.7 prior to 16.7.4, and 16.8 prior to 16.8.1. An unauthorizedattacker is able to assign arbitrary users to MRs that they created withinthe project

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
